typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceOrders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceOrderDetails
sourceOrders, sourceOrderDetails join(sourceOrders@OrderID == sourceOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemOrderID = sourceOrders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = sourceOrders@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = sourceOrders@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		ODCreatedDate = sourceOrderDetails@CreatedDate,
		ODUpdatedDate = sourceOrderDetails@UpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalOrderID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
